typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 split(country=='Austria',
	country=='Estonia',
	country=='Finland',
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(AUS, EST, FIN, Other)
ConditionalSplit1@AUS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AUS'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@EST sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ES'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@FIN sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FIN'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit1@Other sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OTHER'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink4
